entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
